messages.messageBody:
Nanci-- The picture worked!! She is such a SWEETIE!! Now, teach me how to
send pictures!! I have a scanner, windows 98,-- I guess everything I need.
I use AOL. I just never have been able to spend time to learn how to send
pics, but would love to!! It would be nice to share pics of our families!
Thanks for any help you and anyone else can send my way! :) ~Karen
